text: ShoeDazzle is an American online fashion subscription service. It is based in El Segundo, California. Each month, the company debuts a selection of shoes, handbags and jewelry. It provides its members with a showroom based on their fashion preferences. The company was founded by Kim Kardashian, Brian Lee, Robert Shapiro and M.J. Eng in 2009. In August 2013, ShoeDazzle was acquired by rival online fashion subscription service JustFab. The two companies continued to run independently as separate brands. ==References== Category:Companies based in California Category:2009 establishments in California Category:E-commerce Category:shoe companies Category:American clothing companies
title: ShoeDazzle
